Title: Relates to requiring a notice to be posted on all automated teller machines regarding skimming
Summary: Relates to requiring a notice promulgated by the attorney general to be posted on all automated teller machines regarding skimming.
LawCode: Ren §§75-n & 75-o to be §§75-o & 75-p, add §75-n, Bank L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to requiring a notice to be posted on all automated teller machines regarding skimming
